name: Resto-manager
body:
### What is Resto-manager ?
Resto-manager is a restaurant management app built using [_Electron_](http://electron.atom.io/) Framework. It provides features like Bill management, Restaurant bill data and stock inventory. The app is also configured to run with receipt printer to generate bills quickly. The app is easy and quick to use, completely offline and 

### Who can use it ?
The app is aimed specificly at restaurant owners and food chain managers. However, with a few tweaks(*Thanks to open source*) it can be modified for a hotel, store or even general bookkeeping purpose. 

###Contact the developers:
The software is made as a live project, for use in their hostel cafetaria, by students of College of Engineering, Pune. Contact details : @shadabk :: Shadab Khan :: shadabkhan@openmailbox.org
 @shaayaan16 :: Shayan Anwar :: shayananwar@openmailbox.org
